title: Delicious Blackmail
description: Delicious Blackmail J.W. McKenna Janet Mann only wanted to save her husband's job when she reluctantly agreed to sleep with his boss Frank Ramon. A one-time thing. But the emotions she experienced during their lovemaking awoke a part of her that had been long hidden. She found herself drawn to him and what he offered. It made her feel desirable and sexy and complete somehow. She didn't want to hurt her husband, but how could she turn her back on the most consuming sexual experience of her life? Janet soon finds herself drawn into Frank's dark world of obedience and submission and she loves it. But what she didn't know about her "Delicious Blackmail" will lead her to a rather unusual "climax." "Reader Advisory: Novel contains one short scene with female/female touching."
author: J.W. McKenna
